replies.msg: 好呀 或者會撞到

I work in Hotel JAP Okinawa. My cousin has come to stay for three nights as company for me while my colleagues are away. (When I'm in a hotel room I usually have the television on for company until I go to bed) My friend Sarah has got a commission to make a sculpture, do asketcg, paint an oil painting and write an article in picasso. Let me offer my heartfelt congratulations to her for having received a commission for a sculpture, a sketch, an oil painting and an article on picasso from the hotel since it's a rare opportunity. I've always admired the exquisite colors of oil paintings be it a portrait or landscape. Her palette consists of blues greens and browns whereas her former classmate who's also a painter paints from a palette consisting of Ted's whites and oranges. A palette, a set of paintbrushes and paints normally cost three thousand dollars altogether. If you happen to be staying in the aforementioned hotel please remember the following as I work there: First of all before washing your clothes please remove tissues and coins from the pockets and put dirty clothes in about two thirds the size of the wash tub. This will ensure your clothes to get evenly clean and the machine will less likely be out of order. Please wipe the drum with a towel after each use so as not to cause mould or mildew to grow in the drum. Second of all please don't set the air conditioner up to more than twenty five degrees celcius. Otherwise it won't blow cold air and will smell bad. Third after cleaning the tables and the toilet with detergent or sudsy water please rinse a cloth or handkerchief and wipe them again so as not to cause discoloration. Lastly please don't stick or nail anything to the wall as the paint will peel. Finally enjoy your time in Okinawa!

quote.msg: I work in Hotel JAP Okinawa. My cousin has come to stay for three nights as company for me while my colleagues are away. (When I'm in a hotel room I usually have the television on for company until I go to bed) My friend Sarah has got a commission to make a sculpture, do asketcg, paint an oil painting and write an article in picasso. Let me offer my heartfelt congratulations to her for having received a commission for a sculpture, a sketch, an oil painting and an article on picasso from the hotel since it's a rare opportunity. I've always admired the exquisite colors of oil paintings be it a portrait or landscape. Her palette consists of blues greens and browns whereas her former classmate who's also a painter paints from a palette consisting of Ted's whites and oranges. A palette, a set of paintbrushes and paints normally cost three thousand dollars altogether. If you happen to be staying in the aforementioned hotel please remember the following as I work there: First of all before washing your clothes please remove tissues and coins from the pockets and put dirty clothes in about two thirds the size of the wash tub. This will ensure your clothes to get evenly clean and the machine will less likely be out of order. Please wipe the drum with a towel after each use so as not to cause mould or mildew to grow in the drum. Second of all please don't set the air conditioner up to more than twenty five degrees celcius. Otherwise it won't blow cold air and will smell bad. Third after cleaning the tables and the toilet with detergent or sudsy water please rinse a cloth or handkerchief and wipe them again so as not to cause discoloration. Lastly please don't stick or nail anything to the wall as the paint will peel. Finally enjoy your time in Okinawa!
